short_summary: Parks Canada Agency (PCA) is seeking quotes to replace the existing siding of the Cheticamp Information Center with new material. Existing boards are beyond repair and need replacing.
description: In 1978, the current siding was installed. Since then, the boards have deteriorated beyond repair and must be replaced.
full_summary:
**Purchase of Exterior Siding Materials**
===============================

**Introduction**
---------------

The Parks Canada Agency (Agency) invites qualified suppliers to submit proposals for the supply of exterior siding materials to replace the existing boards at the Cheticamp Information Center located in Chéticamp, Cape Breton.

**Scope of Work**
-----------------

The scope of work includes the supply of new siding materials to replace the existing boards, which are beyond repair and require immediate replacement.

**Tender Details**
-----------------

*   **Title**: 5P126-230073 Purchase of Exterior Siding Materials
*   **Reference Number**: WS4229689872-Doc4229774869
*   **Publication Date**: September 29, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date**: October 18, 2023, 2:00 PM NST
*   **Amendment Number**: 0
*   **Solicitation Number**: WS4229689872

**Procurement Method**
----------------------

This tender is being conducted through a Request for Proposal (RFP) process, with a selection criteria based on the Lowest Price.

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------

This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Regions of Opportunity**
---------------------------

The Region affected by this tender is Cape Breton.

**Contact Information**
-----------------------

For further information, please contact:

Leger, Lyne (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: [lyne.leger2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:lyne.leger2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Notice URL**
----------------

The tender notice can be accessed on the following website:
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17586507?extsite=MTc1ODY1MDdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Attachments**
----------------

No attachments are associated with this tender.

Please note that this tender has closed on October 18, 2023. Any further inquiries may not receive a response.
